DOC.brief_summary: This is a dose-finding study to determine if the sublingual administration of the Sufentanil NanoTab is safe and effective in the treatment of post-operative pain.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Sufentanil NanoTab for Management of Acute Pain Following Bunionectomy
DOC.criteria: patients scheduled for bunion surgery daily opioid use drug or alcohol abuse pregnant or breastfeeding women
